input.sentences: today on vacation we visited the old ruins again
there was a church sitting out in the middle of no where
this building was really cool . it was built back in 1723
little [male] climbed to the top of the stone pillar this day
the photos were hand carved into the rock by the gods
output.sentences: John wanted a vacation that was more about sightseeing ancient cultures than gong to the beach.
Mary agreed on the condition that John would come with her to visit some of the local churches.
They found really cool buildings that were beutifully preserved.
They couldn't hep but laugh at a girl who climbed to the top of a stone pillar and waved to them.
They took plenty of photos of beautiful hand carved slabs as mementos.
